product_name: California Road Trip - A Climber's Guide: Northern California
long_description: Explore more than 2,000 routes and more than 100 crags with the help of. Authors: Tom Slater and Chris Summit. Softcover; 455 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Maximus Press; copyright 2009. Each entry includes an area overview, local resources, amenities, description, season, gear and route information. Easy-to-use maps, illustrations, and topos guide you on each climb.
short_description: Explore more than 2,000 routes and more than 100 crags with the help of California Road Trip - A Climber's Guide: Northern California .
